verses.verse: "Even today <S%H3117><s%> my complaint <S%H7879><s%> is rebellious. <S%H4805><s%> His hand <S%H3027><s%> is heavy <S%H3513><s%> in spite of my groaning. <S%H585><s%>
Oh that <S%H5414><s%> I knew <S%H3045><s%> where I might find <S%H4672><s%> him! <S%H935><s%> That I might come even to his seat! <S%H8499><s%>
I would set my cause <S%H4941><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H4390><s%> and fill my mouth <S%H6310><s%> with arguments. <S%H8433><s%>
I would know <S%H3045><s%> the words <S%H4405><s%> which he would answer <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H995><s%> and understand what he would tell me. <S%H559><s%>
Would he contend <S%H7378><s%> with <S%H5978><s%> me in the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of his power? <S%H3581><s%> No, <S%H7760><s%> but he would listen to me.
There the upright <S%H3477><s%> might reason <S%H3198><s%> with him, <S%H6403><s%> so I should be delivered forever <S%H5331><s%> from my judge. <S%H8199><s%>
"If I go <S%H1980><s%> east, <S%H6924><s%> he is not there; <S%H268><s%> if west, I can't <S%H995><s%> find him;
He works <S%H6213><s%> to the north, <S%H8040><s%> but I can't <S%H2372><s%> see him. <S%H5848><s%> He turns south, <S%H3225><s%> but I can't <S%H7200><s%> catch a glimpse of him.
But he knows <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> that I take. <S%H5978><s%> When he has tried <S%H974><s%> me, <S%H3318><s%> I shall come forth like gold. <S%H2091><s%>
My foot <S%H7272><s%> has held <S%H270><s%> fast to his steps. <S%H838><s%> I have kept <S%H8104><s%> his way, <S%H1870><s%> and not turned aside. <S%H5186><s%>

I haven't <S%H4185><s%> gone back from the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of his lips. <S%H8193><s%> I have treasured <S%H6845><s%> up the words <S%H561><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%> more than my necessary food. <S%H2706><s%>
But he stands alone, <S%H259><s%> and who can oppose <S%H7725><s%> him? <S%H5315><s%> What his soul desires, <S%H183><s%> even that he does. <S%H6213><s%>
For he performs <S%H7999><s%> that which is appointed <S%H2706><s%> for me. <S%H7227><s%> Many such things are with him. <S%H2007><s%>
Therefore I am terrified <S%H926><s%> at his presence. <S%H6440><s%> When I consider, <S%H995><s%> I am afraid of him. <S%H6342><s%>
For God <S%H410><s%> has made my heart <S%H3820><s%> faint. <S%H7401><s%> The Almighty <S%H7706><s%> has terrified me. <S%H926><s%>
Because I was not cut off <S%H6789><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the darkness, <S%H2822><s%> neither did he cover <S%H3680><s%> the thick darkness <S%H652><s%> from my face. <S%H6440><s%>
